alert.note: Alert for Chattahoochee; Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Muscogee and western Chattahoochee Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 730 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Avondale, or over Columbus, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Bibb City, Fort Moore, North Fort Moore, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Sand Hill, Battle Park, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Custer Road Terrace, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park, and Carter Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
